Jamus loves book covers. projects.
  • Contact

A series of book covers for Irvine Welshe’s “If You Like School, You’ll Love Work.” Each cover is accompanied by a front flap fold to reveal more about each story.

Selected for Publication in CMYK Magazine’s Call For Aspiring Creatives #43.

Art Direction: Kevin Brainard and Darren Cox.

© 2021 Jamus Marquette.

  • Email
  • Instagram

Jamus is a graphic/motion designer +. He holds a BFA in graphic design from the School of Visual Arts.

Jamus is available for freelance work, collaborations, full-time hire.

Awards and Recognition

  • Works published in Graphic Style Lab: Develop Your Own Style with 50 Hands-On Exercises, by Steven Heller
  • Works published in Design Firms Open for Business, by Steven Heller and Lita Talarico
  • TDC57 Winner
  • Works published in Typography 32
  • Works published in The Language of Graphic Design: An Illustrated Handbook for Understanding Fundamental Design Principles, by Richard Poulin
  • TDC56 Winner
  • Published in Typography 31
  • Works preserved in the AIGA Design Archives
  • Selected for Publication in CMYK Magazine’s Call For Aspiring Creatives #43
  • The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement in Graphic Design, SVA
  • Works published in Visual Literacy: A Conceptual Approach to Graphic Problem Solving, by Richard Wilde and Judith Wilde.
  • The Boyzzz Scholarship Award—Motion Graphics Achievement Award, SVA
  • Selected works featured in Art Directors Club Student Exhibition
  • Silas H. Rhodes Scholarship, SVA
  • Top 10 Portfolio, SVA

Work Experience

  • Freelancer, Volunteer, Nomad, ESL Teacher — Jamus + Adriana, 2013–Now
  • Designer — RED Partners, 2010–2013
  • Freelancer — SpotCo; Pleasure/Kevin Brainard, 2009
